CmdLine: apk add --no-cache bash curl git make gcc g++ python linux-headers binutils-gold gnupg libstdc++ &&     gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys         94AE36675C464D64BAFA68DD7434390BDBE9B9C5         FD3A5288F042B6850C66B31F09FE44734EB7990E         71DCFD284A79C3B38668286BC97EC7A07EDE3FC1         DD8F2338BAE7501E3DD5AC78C273792F7D83545D         C4F0DFFF4E8C1A8236409D08E73BC641CC11F4C8         B9AE9905FFD7803F25714661B63B535A4C206CA9         56730D5401028683275BD23C23EFEFE93C4CFFFE &&     curl -sSLO https://nodejs.org/dist/${VERSION}/node-${VERSION}.tar.xz &&     curl -sSL https://nodejs.org/dist/${VERSION}/SHASUMS256.txt.asc | gpg --batch --decrypt |         grep " node-${VERSION}.tar.xz\$" | sha256sum -c | grep . &&     tar -xf node-${VERSION}.tar.xz &&     cd node-${VERSION} &&     ./configure --prefix=/usr ${CONFIG_FLAGS} &&     make -j$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN) &&     make install &&     cd / &&     apk del make gcc g++ python linux-headers binutils-gold gnupg ${DEL_PKGS} &&     rm -rf ${RM_DIRS} /node-${VERSION}* /usr/share/man /tmp/* /var/cache/apk/*        /root/.npm /root/.node-gyp /root/.gnupg /usr/lib/node_modules/npm/man        /usr/lib/node_modules/npm/doc /usr/lib/node_modules/npm/html /usr/lib/node_modules/npm/scripts
